meanings.definition: A breed of domestic chicken known for its large size and egg-laying abilities.
meanings.sent1: The farmer raised a flock of minorcas for their eggs.
meanings.sent2: The minorcas in the coop clucked happily in the morning.
meanings.sent3: Why did the minorcas refuse to lay eggs? Because they were on strike!
meanings.sent4: The minorcas ruled the roost with their impressive size and egg production.
meanings.sent5: The minorcas strutted around the farm, their large bodies a sight to behold.
